name: OhBall
description:
How to play

-  Hold down the mouse to save energy.

-  Release the mouse rush to the direction of the mouse.

-  A collision with an enemy will loses your HP and the enemy is injured

-  When the ball's HP is lower than 6 and it was hit , it will be killed.

-  When the bule ball hit enemy,  the enemy will be injured.

-  Get higher score.

Tow little balls

-  It can be picked up by you.

- It can be picked up by any ball.

Three enemy balls

-  When he is stronger than you, he wants to get close to you.

-  It wants to shoot you.

-  Maybe you should rush to it.

-  It doesn't want any little ball.
